title: 16: No Such Thing As A Ghost In Poland
content: This week in the QI Office Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing), Anne Miller (@miller_anne) & Alex Bell (@alexbell) discuss randy bears, Bhutanese yeti park rangers, clever 12 year old girls, and more...
